name: NoodleBall
description:
Yiha Party People! Another football game!

Local Multiplayer only - no Singleplayer

Character Controller by Evan Greenwood

Better Description will follow... I am hungry now seeing all these waving Sausages...

Windows version as always: untested

This game is free but you are more then welcome to give the Noodles a small tip. It also helps me to create more free Games for you

Or buy Footbrawl Playground, thats also cool.
